entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
